<!-- Keyboard Shortcuts Help -->
<div class="control-panel">
    <div class="panel-header">
        <h3 class="panel-title">Keyboard Shortcuts</h3>
        <div class="panel-status">
            <button id="toggle-help" class="btn">Show/Hide</button>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div id="keyboard-help" style="display: none;">
        <div class="settings-grid">
            <div class="settings-section">
                <div class="settings-header">Number Keys</div>
                <div class="shortcut-list">
                    <div class="shortcut-item"><kbd>0-9</kbd> → Play corresponding number</div>
                    <div class="shortcut-item"><kbd>*</kbd> → Achtung signal</div>
                    <div class="shortcut-item"><kbd>/</kbd> → Trennung (separator)</div>
                    <div class="shortcut-item"><kbd>+</kbd> → Ende (end signal)</div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="settings-section">
                <div class="settings-header">Control Keys</div>
                <div class="shortcut-list">
                    <div class="shortcut-item"><kbd>Space</kbd> → Short pause</div>
                    <div class="shortcut-item"><kbd>Enter</kbd> → Long pause</div>
                    <div class="shortcut-item"><kbd>Esc</kbd> → Stop/Clear</div>
                    <div class="shortcut-item"><kbd>Tab</kbd> → Toggle live mode</div>
                    <div class="shortcut-item"><kbd>R</kbd> → Start/Stop recording</div>
                    <div class="shortcut-item"><kbd>P</kbd> → Play last sequence</div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
